item.title: Why medals at the 2026 Winter Olympics are worth more than ever
item.description: Gold and silver prices are soaring to new highs, driving 2026 Winter Olympics medal values to historic levels during the Milan Cortina games.

item.title: Mortgage rates tick higher but remain near 6%
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage rose this week to 6.11%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released Thursday. That is up from last...

item.title: January layoffs rose to the highest level for the month since 2009
item.description: Major employers including UPS and Amazon announced significant job cuts in January, with transportation and tech sectors leading the nationwide layoff...

item.title: Chrysler recalls more than 450,000 vehicles over brake light failure
item.description: Chrysler recalled more than 450,000 vehicles and more than 2,000 tow-trailer modules due to a brake light failure that could raise the risk of a crash...

item.title: Private sector added 22,000 jobs in January, well below expectations, ADP says
